trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The merrow can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The merrow can mimic voices and animal sounds. A creature that hears the mimicries can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The merrow makes three Spined Tail attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of Spellcasting to cast {@spell Command|XPHB}.

action.name: Spined Tail
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
